experience.name: ING Spain
experience.description: Involved in developing the web and mobile banking app, with a focus on allowing users to perform certain actions in-app, reducing the workload on call centers and giving more control to end users.

experience.name: Inditex

experience.name: JTI

experience.name: British Council
